item.title: BTOB Be Together New Album Release
item.description: BTOB New Album Release : Be Together Playlist : Be Together Album 1. Intro : 발자취 (The Trace) 2. 노래 (The Song) 3. 봄이 피어나 (Blooming Day) 4. 우리 (Be Together) 5. My Way 6. Whiskey 7. Interlude: Re 8. Lonely 9. 춤 (Dance with Me) 10. Higher 11. Thank You 12. 흘려보내 (It’s All Good) 13. Outro : Encore
